plugin.name: QuickChild
plugin.description:
This plug-in enables you to quickly create a child ticket from current opened one.

plugin.name: Gravatar
plugin.description:
RT::Extension::Gravatar - Displays Gravatar images within RT.

[sdm_download id="173" fancy="0"]

plugin.name: Jse
plugin.description: This is a test plug-in, witch wishes you 'Happy Easter' on Easter by Gregorian Calendar. It places in these days a little rabbit icon on toolbar. The text in pop-up window refers to Disney's 'Springtime with Roo' animated musical comedy film. [sdm_download id="165" fancy="0"]
